name: podloom-podcast-player
description: Build tools for PodLoom Podcast Player

scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o assets/css/podcast20-styles.min.css assets/css/podcast20-styles.css && cleancss -o assets/css/rss-player.min.css assets/css/rss-player.css
scripts.minify:admin-js: terser admin/js/rss-manager.js -o admin/js/rss-manager.min.js --compress --mangle && terser admin/js/settings-page.js -o admin/js/settings-page.min.js --compress --mangle && terser admin/js/typography-manager.js -o admin/js/typography-manager.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:admin-js && npm run minify:admin-css && npm run minify:elementor && npm run minify:block
scripts.build:frontend: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
